results.title: Code name Snake's Eye
results.brief_description: A story of a marine commando exercise; a combined operation of ships, planes, frogmen and commandos. A coastal town with the code name “Snake’s Eye” is the objective. Frogmen-parachutists drop from the sky and set to work under the sea; waves of strike aircraft are catapulted into action from a carrier; mass troops are landed by naval helicopters and assault landing craft; commandos are seen taking part in a breathtaking cliff-assault. The action demonstrates the astonishing versatility of the men of the Royal Marines as they go into combat on land, at sea and in the air.

results.title: Code blue
results.creator_credit: Andrew O'Sullivan, Pascal Guilloux, Moira Moss and AFTRS
results.brief_description: A busy intersection in a large city. Everyone is going about their own business - waiting to cross the road, minding their children…A jay-walker is run over by a courier van. How fast can the city heal itself? ‘Code blue’ is a tightly directed and beautifully paced film which has screened at over 20 festivals throughout the world. The film’s blue tones help to create a tense and emotive ten minute journey through a fast city.

results.title: Coda
results.brief_description:
Episode number 6 of Series “Orchestra Series”.
Part Six of the Orchestra series which describes the evolution of the modern symphony orchestra from its beginnings in the 17th century to the present. Jane Glover looks at the work of an orchestra in detail. Taking the score of Ravel’s “Bolero” she works through it with the London Symphony Orchestra. Today the conductor is as much a “star” as the orchestra itself. Jane Glover discusses just what the conductor does to deserve this stardom.

results.title: Cocoon: the return (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Daniel Petrie, Lili Zanuck, David Brown, Richard Zanuck and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: The space travellers return to earth on a special rescue mission to retrieve their alien friends who lay at the bottom of the ocean, sleeping in cocoons. However, scientists have opened one of the pods and the innocent alien inside is to be turned over to the military who want to exploit its mental abilities. Meanwhile, the returning earthlings each react differently to being back on earth and seeing their loved ones again. When the time comes to leave, some will go to live forever and some will stay on Earth to live out the remainder of their lives. Stars Don Ameche, Wilford Brimley, Courtney Cox, Hume Cronyn, Jack Gilford, Steve Guttenberg, Barret Oliver, Maureen Stapleton, Elaine Stritch, Jessica Tandy, Gwen Verdon and Tahnee Welch.

results.title: Cocoon (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Ron Howard, Lili Zanuck, David Brown, Richard Zanuck and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Ron Howard’s enchanting sci-fi fantasy about a group of resident senior citizens in a Florida rest home who discover a fountain of youth from another planet is close to being the ultimate in feelgood movies. Their lives turned upside down when they meet some bizarre and not-so-human beings who are visitors from a distant galaxy. They have come to Earth on a rescue mission to retrieve a secret which has lain hidden on the ocean floor for thousands of years. They share a wondrous adventure and learn more about love and friendship than they ever imagined. Cast includes Don Ameche, Wilford Brimley, Hume Cronyn, Brian Dennehy, Jack Gifford, Steve Guttenberg, Maureen Stapleton, Jessica Tandy, Gwen Verdon, Herta Ware and Tahnee Welch.

results.title: Cocoa harvest
results.brief_description: The film shows the method of harvesting cocoa in the Gold Coast region of West Africa, including scenes of village life, sacks of beans on their way to the depot for grading and weighing, and finally transport by train and truck to the coast to be loaded on to ocean going steamers for export.

results.title: Cocktail (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Roger Donaldson, Robert W. Court, Ted Field, Interscope, Silver Screen Pictures and Touchstone
results.brief_description: When a young, confident and ambitious bartender moves to Jamaica he meets an artist and their romance brings a new perspective to his self-centered life. Stars Tom Cruise and Bryan Brown.
